description: Beddy-Byes is a large, blue-skinned humanoid Yo-kai with blonde braided hair.  She wears a pink nightgown, has mismatched eyes (one red, one blue), no nose, sharp teeth, and disproportionate limbs. Despite a caring personality and desire to protect children, she can be aggressive and sometimes experiences horniness and sassiness.  Her abilities include immense strength, ice breath, and summoning toys.
